snippet.title: Black Emperor Arcade Game is Officially Released
snippet.description:
Speed, death and rock & roll. 
Black Emperor combines classic action arcade with Japanese psychedelic rock and the Bosozoku motorcycle culture of the '70's. This addictive, exciting game keeps players coming back to race for the high score. 

We debuted this game at Amusement Expo 2019 as a prototype. Due to Covid we held off on releasing it. The game is now officially released!

Learn more: https://shop.bumblebeargames.com/collections/black-emperor/products/black-emperor 

Special thanks to:
Matt Antonucci- cinematography
Metrocade NY - pinball machines
Wonderville- on-site location
Black Emperor Bar- on site location
Daphane Love- actress
Soundtrack- Black Emperor Game


#blackemperor #rockandroll #arcadegame #arcademachine #arcadebar
